idea: •NM UNITED food and agro pvt ltd - We provide a wide range of tasty Dry Fish which is prepared from fresh fishes. Our Dry Fish is stored using advanced technology as well as the indigenous acumen of the community people of Maharashtra. Our Dry Fishes are a much preferred item for food connoisseurs across the globe as they are high on taste and nutrition. Dry Fish provided by us is hygienically packed under the supervision of trained personnel, free from chemicals or contaminants, making them fit for consumption. The price of Dry Fish and its availability is variable as it depends on the catching season
name: NM-UNITEDFOOD AND AGRO PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Horizzon Information Technologies Private Limited

idea: We are working on an end to end platform for Investment Advisory in the Indian Stock Market. Currently, there are 2 severe challenges facing the industry, which is a headache for the regulator and Govt as well – First is of a tamper proof technology to give authentic investment advise to client and second is meeting all regulatory norms. There is rampant fraud in the market and SEBI is taking action to reduce it, but it continues till date. We are working on a crypto backed, tamper proof advisory platform which can be used by any adviser in the market. This will be available as an enterprise solution for any registered adviser. The system being backed by cryptographic backend will be immutable, tamper proof and self audited. Anyone can authenticate the advise given and ensure complete transparency. There is current no offerings in the market similar to this and this is limiting the spread of investment advisory inspite of Govt and Regulator trying to promote it by various measures. So we are solving the technology, trust and compliance challenges associated with investment advisory.
name: FINMART TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Equipping Working Professionals With The Future of Language Education Via A Blend of Technology and Guided Human Supervision


Edspire’s primary goal is to continuously upgrade working professionals with necessary skills and competencies, for them to cater to a wide range of learning styles and abilities in their learning spaces, and move forward on their career trajectory.


 The changing scenarios of world economy and advancement in modern technologies have resulted in adoption of several new trends in education for sustainable living. These key trends and revolutionary reforms in education are all about innovation, accessibility, and making a difference in the world. In our best efforts to facilitate practical knowledge and strategies to working professionals, for them to grow personally and professionally, and succeed in the modern world, Edspire has embraced the world's best education system, Finnish education. We are here to take forward the globally acknowledged ‘Finnish Phenomenon’ via our crafted programmes, to equip working professionals develop appropriate abilities and knowledge to take back to their learning spaces, and build life-long learning experiences for their diverse learners.
name: SAUGUSS EDTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
